resources.string:
TravelFriend searches and navigates near by Hospitals, Ambulance & Emergency Services, Fuel Stations, Restuarants etc for any location. The application auto detects the user location by GPS or by Network Services and collects data through various online resources by best efforts.

Terms & Usage
